          Theme Maintenance
          • Theme Updates
          • Backup and Restore
          • Configuring Child Themes

          To configure Custom Page template:

          • Go to Page pane in the left admin menu. You can customize the created pages by hovering over existing pages, and clicking edit.

          • In the Page Attributes pane, choose the page template you want to customize.

          • Depending on the page (Blog page, Contact page, etc.), following settings are available in My Custom Meta Box:
          Page template Configuration options
          Blog Page Hide Auto Thumbnail – check to disable automatic display of thumbnails.Number of Posts per Page - define the number of posts to display in the page.Select Blog Categories - select the categories of the posts to display within the page.Show Featured Image Form – check to enable comment box on your page.
          Contact Page Email To – check to show email to receive user-generated messages.
          Sitemap Page Page Content – check the box next to the page types to display them in the sitemap. Static Pages - provide a name for the list of static pages or leave it to default version. All Categories - provide a name for the list of all categories or leave it to default version. Tags – provide a name for the list of tags or leave it to default version. Archives - provide a name for the list of archives or leave it to default version. Authors - provide a name for the list of authors or leave it to default version. Posts - provide a name for the list of posts or leave it to default version.
          Gallery Page Number of Posts per Page - define the number of posts to display for the page. Select Blog Categories - select the categories of the posts to display within the page.
